verses.text: Later, \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w formed|strong="H2859"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w alliance|strong="H2859"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* marrying \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*. \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w City|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* well \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w however|strong="H7535"\w*, \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w still|strong="H5971"\w* \w sacrificing|strong="H2076"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* loved \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w except|strong="H7535"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w burned|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w place|strong="H1116"\w*. \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w One|strong="H7200"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w Ask|strong="H7592"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*!”

\w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* replied, “\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w shown|strong="H6213"\w* \w much|strong="H6213"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w*, \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w uprightness|strong="H3483"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w maintained|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w very|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H4427"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w place|strong="H8478"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* only \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H3808"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w is|strong="H5650"\w* here \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* chosen, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w too|strong="H7227"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7227"\w* \w to|strong="H5650"\w* \w count|strong="H5608"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w number|strong="H5608"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w discern|strong="H8085"\w* \w between|strong="H8199"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* govern \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w Yours|strong="H5650"\w*?”

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \f + \fr 3:10 \ft Hebrew Adonai; also in verse 15\f* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H8010"\w* \w made|strong="H8010"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w request|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H7592"\w*, “\w Since|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w instead|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* requesting \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w wealth|strong="H6239"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5315"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* enemies—\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* discernment \w to|strong="H3117"\w* administer \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*—

\w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w asked|strong="H1697"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* discerning \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="H1571"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w what|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w request|strong="H7592"\w*—\w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w honor|strong="H3519"\w*—\w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w during|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4428"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* equal.

\w So|strong="H1980"\w* if \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, just \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w did|strong="H1732"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* prolong \w your|strong="H8104"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w awoke|strong="H3364"\w*, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w indeed|strong="H2009"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H8010"\w* \w been|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w returned|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*. \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w held|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*. Solomon Judges Wisely

\w At|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w time|strong="H6440"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w prostitutes|strong="H2185"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w One|strong="H2063"\w* \w woman|strong="H3205"\w* said, “Please, \w my|strong="H5973"\w* lord, \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w woman|strong="H3205"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H1004"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w same|strong="H2063"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H1004"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w while|strong="H5973"\w* \w she|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w woman|strong="H2114"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* baby. \w We|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* alone, \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w no|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H7992"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*.

During \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* woman’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w she|strong="H2063"\w* rolled \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w she|strong="H7901"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* side while \w I|strong="H6965"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w asleep|strong="H3463"\w*. \w She|strong="H7901"\w* \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3205"\w* next \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* discovered \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* examined \w him|strong="H3205"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w realized|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w borne|strong="H3205"\w*.”

“\w No|strong="H3808"\w*,” \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w other|strong="H2063"\w* woman, “\w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w first|strong="H1121"\w* woman insisted, “\w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w yours|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w mine|strong="H6440"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* argued \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* replied, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w* says, ‘\w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w yours|strong="H4191"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*,’ \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w* says, ‘\w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* mine \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*.’”

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* continued, “\w Bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*,
